TestCase.ManualSteps: Add AzSK_SVT Task to your release definition.From agent phase select Hosted agent. Save and queue the release.
TestCase.Description: Verify if CICD task is running successfully on a hosted agent.

TestCase.ManualSteps: Add AzSK_SVT Task to your release definition.Create a non-hosted agent.From agent phase select your non-Hosted agent. Save and queue the release
TestCase.Description: Verify if CICD task is running successfully on a non-hosted agent.

TestCase.ManualSteps: Add AzSK_SVT Task to your release definition.From agent phase select Hosted VS2017 agent. Save and queue the release.
TestCase.Description: Verify if CICD task is running successfully on a hosted agent.
